喣字的基本解释

喣
xǔ
哈气。
吐（唾沫）：“喣沫求涓滴。”
爱抚。

喣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xǔ］
［《廣韻》況羽切，上麌，曉。］
亦作“1”。
(1)同“呴1”。吹气；吐出。
(2)见“喣愉”、“喣喣嘔嘔”。
(3)见“喣喣”。
(4)同“煦”。温暖。引申为抚育，使成长。

喣字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　喣； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页199第22
【廣韻】況羽切【集韻】【韻會】火羽切，?音詡。【廣韻】呈示。　又【集韻】吹也。本作欨。【前漢·中山靖王傳】衆喣漂山。或作呴。又【正字通】與煦同，溫潤之也。【唐書·魏徵傳】護民之勞，喣之若子。　又【正字通】諂笑貌。【柳宗元·與顧十郞書】喣喣趄趄。　又【前漢·中山靖王傳註】師古曰：喣，吁句反。　又【集韻】【韻會】?匈于切，音吁。義同。【前漢·師古註】又音許于反。【王充·論衡】風猶人之有吹喣也。　又【集韻】一曰笑意。

喣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
喣字的起名意思

暂无。

Hu
Basic explanation of words
Hu
xǔ
Breathing.
Spit (spit): "I beg you to trickle down."
Caress.
Hu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xǔ]
["Guang Yun" Kuang Yu cuts, Shang Chu, Xiao. ]
Also called "1".
(1) Same as "呴1". Blow; spit out.
(2) See "Yu Yu", "Yu Yu".
(3) See "喣喣".
(4) Same as "Xu". warm. The extension is to nurture and grow.
Hu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　喣; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 199 22
[Guang Yun] Kuang Yu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Fire Yu cut,? Yin Xu. 【Guangyun】Presented.　 [Ji Yun] Blow it again. This is made of 欨. [Previous Han·Zhongshan Jingwang Biography] All the people floated on the mountain. Or do it. Also [Zhengzitong] is the same as Xu, it is also warm and moist. [Tang Shu·Wei Zheng Chuan] The labor of protecting the people is like a son.　【Zhengzitong】Smiling face again. 【Liu Zongyuan·Book with Gu Shiyun】Chu 喣喣趄.　[Previous Han·Zhongshan Jing Wang Chuan Note] Shi Gu said: 喣, call the sentence back.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Hun Yuqie, sound. The same meaning. [Previous Han·Shigu Note] You Yin Xu Yufan. [Wang Chong·Lunheng] The wind is still blowing.　[Jiyun] One said a smile.
